name: shrapnel
description:
You’ve got a shield, and there’s a whole lot of explosions going on.  Your shield could probably take a hit or two, but who knows how much damage it can take.  Survive as long as possible.

 

Movement: W, A, S, D to move around the area

Rotate: <- , -> to rotate your shield to the left or right.

Made for: LowRezJam-2021
